title: Number of snow sports ( skier/snowboard ) visits in the United States 2000 to 2019
yAxis: Number of skier visits in millions
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of skier visits in millions, containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Number of skier visits in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 10/11 and 11/12.
The highest Number of skier visits in millions, of value 60.54 was reached at Year 10/11
The lowest Number of skier visits in millions, of value 50.97 was reported at Year 11/12
